Service:
To adress budget restrictions changing from 9 000 USD to 6 500 USD / monthly
With resulting total cost of 5 739 USD / month:

I) EC2 Instances were reduced to 2x 379.79 USD / month |  t3.xlarge (Memory: 8GiB, vCPU: 2)
    from 2x 931.67 USD / month |  t3.2xlarge (Memory: 32GiB, vCPU: 8)
II) EC2 price was further reduced by reserving 3-year computing capacity
  
III)DB server was reduced to 2,670 USD / month | db.m5.8xlarge (Memory: 128GiB, vCPU: 32) 
    from 4,002 USD / month |  db.m5.8xlarge (Memory: 192GiB, vCPU: 48)
